i had to cross over this unique bridge and it was scary .
just enjoying a nice ride down in this perfect snow

output.sentences: Susan started her cross-country ski trip.
Her trail was unique and scary, requiring her to cross several creeks and rivers.
The snow on her trail was perfert for riding, though.
She was soon ready to hike up the hill after approaching the ledge.
Riding down the hills, she avoided all the trees successfully.
